review: Awesome device for a first edition.  Add the full HBO GO catalog and I would give 5 stars....or if HBO go would allow you to "cast" to the FireTV then I'd give 5 stars, but both HBO and Amazon seem to be in agreement with only letting us have access to some content, not all.And please Amazon, update the GUIs so it's perfectly CLEAR whether a movie/TV show you search for is free w/PRIME or requires payment!  Both your website and this device's layout are confusing.
